Hi,
I know that unit tests should run on their own and every test should 
be executable of its own - but..
we want to use unit tests for a QA related functional framework and 
we yet defined some tasks with ant to run tests in a specific order. 
My question: is there any extension for junit to define properties 
for tests in a more straightforward way then java properties files 
(xml?) and to combine several unit tests with global attributes and 
properties?

thanks in advance!

erik stunkat
